text: Ervin Mészáros (2 April 1877 - 21 May 1940) was a Hungarian fencer. He won a gold and a bronze medal at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1940 deaths Category:Hungarian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Hungary Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Hungary Category:Martial artists from Budapest Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Medalists at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Ervin Mészáros
